title: The Asset Allocator: Google Collapse?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Daniel Colin James, a futurist and editor-in-chief of ForwardTick.com, wrote a fascinating article brazenly titled “This is How Google Will Collapse.” He offered some compelling reasons, but his timing was off. This podcast (4:56) suggests that the sense of permanence big businesses impart is illusory and that advisors, practically speaking, should ensure that client portfolios can withstand the collapse of any one stock, be it Google or Microsoft. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
